name: MetforminAllergyIntoleranceSCT
title: Metformin AllergyIntolerance SCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: SNOMED CT codes that could be returned by the FHIR AllergyIntolerance resource, and would indicate allergy or intolerance to Metformin),(Data Element Scope: ALLERGY_INTOLERANCE:),(Inclusion Criteria: SNOMED CT  codes for individual medications that are Metformin, and various codes that would indicate allergy or intolerance to Metformin as a class, or individual Metformin),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
